title: Who was tf based off anyway?
body:
who was he based off?

 was it an "original" idea (unlikely because multiple card throwing people already existed)

Luxord

Gambit 

Tubalcain Alhambra?

or a mix of all? or what?

you like steal q and aa from gambit, teleport and e from Tubalcain and the dress from a mix of luxord and tubalcain?

replies.body: haha that's funny son, but i'm your father

Indiana Jones.
So don't touch the hat.
